@admin.register(GeoNodeThemeCustomization)


[docs]
class GeoNodeThemeCustomizationAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):


[docs]
    form = GeonodeThemCustomizationForm




[docs]
    list_display = ("id", "is_enabled", "name", "date", "description")




[docs]
    list_display_links = (
        "id",
        "name",
    )
